content: FYI, if you or anyone you know is interested in working on a larger, research- or implementation-heavy PL/compiler project from the perspective of improving Roc, we are keeping a list of project ideas at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mMaxIi7vxyUyNAUCs98d68jYj6C9Fpq4JIZRU735Kwg/edit?usp=sharing. These projects might be suitable for bachelor/master theses, independent studies, or just long-stretched personal projects.
